remarks: Membership in a restricted class abstraction, expressed with explicit class substitution.  (The variation ~ elrabf has implicit substitution).  The hypothesis specifies that ` x ` must not be a free variable in ` B ` .  (Contributed by NM, 30-Sep-2003.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
elrabsf.1 $e |- F/_ x B $.
elrabsf $p |- ( A e. { x e. B | ph } <-> ( A e. B /\ [. A / x ]. ph ) ) $.
